body_html: Not sure if this is the same, on ppc64le I am seeing errors similar to ones described using Pascal (P100) , NVIDIA-SMI 384.81, cuda9. The failing tests in this case are test_all_gather_group, test_all_reduce_group_max, test_all_reduce_group_min, test_all_reduce_group_product , test_all_reduce_group_sum, test_barrier_group, test_broadcast_group, test_gather_group, test_reduce_group_max, test_reduce_group_min, test_reduce_group_product, test_reduce_group_sum, test_scatter_group

The failing tests in this case are test_all_gather_group, test_all_reduce_group_max, test_all_reduce_group_min, test_all_reduce_group_product , test_all_reduce_group_sum, test_barrier_group, test_broadcast_group, test_gather_group, test_reduce_group_max, test_reduce_group_min, test_reduce_group_product, test_reduce_group_sum, test_scatter_group
